mean_cn: n.震级；巨大；重要性；【数】量值
mean_en: the size of an earthquake; the great size or importance of something; the degree to which something is large or important
sentence: The horrible earthquake here had a magnitude of 8.0.
sentence_trans: 这里发生了一场8.0级特大地震。
word_etyma: magn大 + itude后缀，构成抽象名词 → magnitude重量
